page.title: 15"A SCHOOLCHILD'S DAY"(cont.)
page.content: doing before,until{12 o'clock. At{lunchtime}we set the table and chairs behind the{cutlery trolley } where the tables and chairs are kept.We set out a table and enough chairs for everyone. At{1.10p.m.}the whistle is blown and everyone walks in.In the{afternoon}we normally finish what we started in the morning.Today I finished the{South Of {England Show}work and did some more to my{Domesday map. When next play ends we carry on with the same work.At{3p.m}we have to start clearing up,because{Mrs Roussel normally ends up telling us a story. At{3.20 p.m.}we are{free of school until the next day.When I get home I make myself a drink.Then I ring up my mum to tell her I am home,then I turn the{t.v}on and watch it whilst doing my homework.
